00001 #ifndef __AMOP_CHECKOFFSETFUNC_HH
00002 #define __AMOP_CHECKOFFSETFUNC_HH

00005 #include "Config.h"

00007 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00008 #pragma warning(disable:4505)
00009 #endif
00010 
00011 namespace amop
00012 {
00013 
00014 namespace Detail
00015 {
00016 
00017 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 namespace Inner
00019 {
00020     class TCheck 
00021     {
00022     public:
00023         static bool mIsCheckCall;
00024         static size_t mDestructorOffset;
00025 
00026         typedef bool* TCheckType;        
00027     };
00028 
00029     namespace TCheckOffset
00030     {
00031         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00032         typedef int (TCheck::*TCheckFuncPtr) (TCheck::TCheckType&);
00033 
00034 
00035         
00036 
00037         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00038         template<int I>
00039         class TCheckIdx
00040         {
00041         public:
00042             int Func( TCheck::TCheckType& checkCode) 
00043             { 
00044                 checkCode = &TCheck::mIsCheckCall; 
00045                 return I; 
00046             }
00047 
00048             void Destructor( void* )
00049             {
00050                 TCheck::mDestructorOffset = I;
00051             }
00052         };
00053 
00054         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00055         TCheck* CreateCheckObject();
00056 
00057         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00058         TCheck* CreateCheckDestroyObject();        
00059 
00060         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00061         template <class T>
00062         static size_t GetOffset(T memFuncPtr)
00063         {
00064             Inner::TCheckOffset::TCheckFuncPtr check = 
00065                 reinterpret_cast<Inner::TCheckOffset::TCheckFuncPtr>(memFuncPtr);
00066 
00067             TCheck::mIsCheckCall = false; 
00068             TCheck* checkObject = CreateCheckObject();
00069 
00070             TCheck::TCheckType checkCode = 0;
00071             size_t offset = (checkObject->*check)(checkCode);   
00072 
00073             if(&TCheck::mIsCheckCall != checkCode)
00074             {
00075                 throw TNotPureVirtualException();
00076             }
00077 
00078             return offset;
00079         }
00080 
00081         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00082         template <class T>
00083         static size_t GetOffsetDestructor()
00084         {
00085             TCheck::mDestructorOffset = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00086             
00087             TCheck* checkObject = CreateCheckDestroyObject();
00088 
00089             // Force delete it..
00090             delete (T*)checkObject;
00091 
00092             if(0xFFFFFFFF == TCheck::mDestructorOffset)
00093             {
00094                 throw TNotPureVirtualException();
00095             }
00096 
00097             return TCheck::mDestructorOffset;
00098         }
00099             
00100 
00101         
00102     };
00103 
00104 }
00105 
00106 }
00107 
00108 }
